data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: I get so angry when I clean the house. My ____ has ____ leaving ____ everywhere, so ____ house ____ very ____. I ____ can't ____ up ____ the ____ being ____! I've been trying to get my criticisms across to my brother, but he just doesn't care.
data.partBlankContent: I get so angry when I clean the house. My bro____ has be__ leaving pla___ everywhere, so t__ house i_ very clut_____. I ju__ can't p__ up wi__ the ho___ being me___! I've been trying to get my criticisms across to my brother, but he just doesn't care.
data.answer: 我打扫房子的时候很生气。我哥哥到处乱丢东西，所以家里很乱。我就是不能忍受家里乱糟糟的!我一直试图把我的批评传达给我哥哥，但他就是不在乎。
